title: （純學術討論）韓國對德國第二球唔係越位咩？

replies.msg:
The law states that a player is in an offside position if any of their body parts except the hands and arms is in the opponents' half of the pitch and closer to the opponents' goal line than both the ball and the second-last opponent (the last is usually but not necessarily the goalkeeper).
